title: Project Vision Alignment Audit
description: The analysis from 2025-11-12 showed that several projects are not aligned with the framework's vision. This task is to conduct a formal audit of all projects in the 'projects/' directory. Projects must be either brought into alignment, formally paused, or archived.
acceptance_criteria: A report is created for each project, detailing its alignment status.
The 'homeserver-vision-documentation' project is either fixed or archived.
All active projects have a clear and documented alignment with the core vision.
notes: Ensures that development effort is focused on projects that provide strategic value.
